item.title: Setup shell completion
item.description: Using hit with shell completions reduces the number of keystrokes required to execute a request by an order of magnitude. To enable shell completion in your current shell: source <(hit completion) Once enabled, press TAB to get a recommendation for all available request identifiers in the current working directory. To set up completion permanently, please follow the instructions specific to your shell: Bash # echo ' # enable shell completions for hit command # https://hit.
